Selfin:
My lord - the great ruler of the Giants, who will be able to bring them back to life. When the Giants were defeated in the war with the gods, the light of my lord ripped body and scattered it across the continent, and the spirit sealed in Esagire.
Recently, the spirit of my lord woke up from a dream that is indistinguishable from death. He regained consciousness, but not enough.
Let's go to my master. If you help him, he will reward you with a bang . About Hero wise people! So what? Germunkusu help? Want to get a new strength and rebirth? What do you do?
